About

I am an engineer based in New York. I am currently at Actively AI, building AI for sales teams.

From 2020 to 2025, I was at Salesforce, working in the Trust Intelligence Platform team. I worked on Flink-based streaming systems for anomaly detection, transpilers and optimizing context windows. :)

I spent four great years at Carnegie Mellon University from 2016 to 2020, focusing on statistics and machine learning.
